pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Dichotomous Choice Contingent Valuation Data // Functions for analyzing dichotomous choice contingent valuation (CV) data. It provides functions for estimating parametric and nonparametric models for single-, one-and-one-half-, and double-bounded CV data. For details, see Aizaki et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s42081-022-00171-1.
